valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 6 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 7 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Fair Isle 999 expected Dogger 992 by midday tomorrow. Low Fisher 1006, losing its identity by same time
